Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, shrimp paste, chili peppers, onions, garlic, ginger
Instructions: Cut pork belly into strips. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger. Add pork and cook until browned. Add shrimp paste and chili peppers. Pour coconut milk and simmer until thick. Season with salt and pepper.

Ingredient: Taro leaves, coconut milk, pork or shrimp, chili peppers, onions, garlic, ginger
Instructions: Clean taro leaves and remove stems. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger. Add pork/shrimp and cook. Add taro leaves and coconut milk. Add chili peppers. Simmer until leaves are tender.

Ingredient: Pork, coconut milk, string beans, squash, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add vegetables and coconut milk. Add chili peppers. Simmer until meat is tender and sauce is thick.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, kamote leaves, chili peppers, onions, garlic, ginger
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and chili peppers. Add kamote leaves. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork belly, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, sugar
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar for 30 minutes. Sauté garlic until golden. Add pork and marinate. Add bay leaves and peppercorns. Simmer until tender.

Ingredient: Chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, potatoes
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic. Add chicken and marinate. Add bay leaves, peppercorns, and potatoes. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, liver, tomato sauce, bell peppers, onions, garlic, soy sauce
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add liver and tomato sauce. Add bell peppers and soy sauce. Simmer until meat is tender.

Ingredient: Beef, potatoes, carrots, onions, garlic, tomato sauce, soy sauce
Instructions: Cut beef into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add beef and brown. Add tomato sauce and soy sauce. Add potatoes and carrots. Simmer until beef is tender.

Ingredient: Pork shoulder, liver, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, sugar
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic. Add pork and liver. Add bay leaves and sugar. Simmer until pork is tender and sauce is thick.

Ingredient: Milkfish, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, tamarind, kangkong
Instructions: Clean milkfish and cut into steaks. Boil water with tamarind. Add tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger. Add fish and simmer. Add kangkong leaves. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Pork ribs, tamarind, tomatoes, onions, kangkong, radish, string beans
Instructions: Cut pork ribs into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add pork and simmer until tender. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Shrimp, tamarind, tomatoes, onions, kangkong, radish, string beans
Instructions: Clean shrimp. Boil water with tamarind. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables and simmer. Add shrimp last and cook until pink. Add kangkong. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Beef short ribs, corn, cabbage, potatoes, onions, garlic, fish sauce
Instructions: Cut beef into pieces. Boil beef with onions until tender. Add corn and potatoes. Add cabbage last. Season with fish sauce and salt. Serve hot with steamed rice.

Ingredient: Pork, shrimp, tofu, kangkong, string beans, squash, bagoong
Instructions: Cut pork into pieces and boil until tender. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add tofu and shrimp. Season with bagoong. Add kangkong last.

Ingredient: Pork belly, blood, vinegar, onions, garlic, chili peppers, salt
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook. Add blood and vinegar. Add chili peppers. Simmer until thick. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Beef, onions, garlic, soy sauce, calamansi, pepper, cooking oil
Instructions: Slice beef thinly. Marinate in soy sauce and calamansi. Sauté onions until soft. Set aside. Cook marinated beef in same pan. Return onions on top. Serve with rice.

Ingredient: Pork belly, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, onions, bay leaves
Instructions: Cut lechon into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add lechon pieces and brown. Add soy sauce, brown sugar, and bay leaves. Simmer until sauce is thick.

Ingredient: Chicken, coconut milk, lemongrass, ginger, onions, garlic, chili peppers
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add water and lemongrass. Add chili peppers and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, malunggay leaves, ginger, onions, garlic
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into steaks. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add water and simmer. Add coconut milk and malunggay leaves. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, taro, string beans, squash, shrimp paste
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and simmer. Add vegetables and shrimp paste. Cook until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, kangkong, okra, eggplant, squash, bagoong
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and vegetables. Season with bagoong. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork shoulder, tomatoes, onions, garlic, potatoes, carrots, soy sauce
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add potatoes, carrots, and soy sauce. Simmer until meat is tender.

Ingredient: Chicken, tomatoes, onions, garlic, potatoes, carrots, bell peppers
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add vegetables. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, onions, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, and peppercorns. Simmer until pork is tender.

Ingredient: Beef, onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, potatoes, fish sauce
Instructions: Cut beef shank into pieces with marrow. Boil beef until tender. Add onions, garlic, ginger. Add tomatoes and potatoes. Season with fish sauce. Simmer until vegetables are cooked.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, green beans, eggplant, okra, squash
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and simmer. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Season with salt.

Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and green papaya. Add chili leaves. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and banana heart. Add string beans and squash. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, green beans, eggplant, okra, kangkong
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and hard vegetables first. Add kangkong last. Season with salt.

Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and sitaw. Add kalabasa, talong, and okra. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and vegetables. Add malunggay leaves last. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, kangkong, sitaw, kalabasa, bagoong
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk, sitaw, and kalabasa. Add kangkong last. Season with bagoong.

Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk, squash, and string beans. Add kamote tops last. Season with salt.

Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and upo. Add sitaw and kalabasa. Add malunggay leaves last. Season with salt.

Instructions: Clean shrimp. Sauté garlic and onions. Add coconut milk, squash, and string beans. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add kangkong last. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, labong, sitaw, kalabasa, chili
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk and labong. Add sitaw, kalabasa, and chili. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk, squash, and string beans. Add alugbati last. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, saluyot, squash, okra, bagoong
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk, squash, and okra. Add saluyot last. Season with bagoong.

Ingredient: Chicken, coconut milk, papaya leaves, ginger, onions, chili
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and chili. Add papaya leaves last. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, sweet potato leaves, squash, string beans
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and brown. Add coconut milk, squash, and string beans. Add sweet potato leaves last. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, water spinach, squash, eggplant, onions
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk, squash, and eggplant. Add water spinach last. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Pork, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, potatoes, eggs
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook. Add potatoes and hard-boiled eggs. Simmer until tender.

Ingredient: Chicken wings, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns
Instructions: Marinate chicken wings in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic until golden. Add chicken wings and marinate. Add bay leaves and peppercorns. Simmer until wings are tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, tofu, bay leaves
Instructions: Cut pork belly and tofu into cubes. Marinate pork in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic. Add pork and cook. Add tofu and bay leaves. Simmer until pork is tender.

Ingredient: Squid, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, bay leaves
Instructions: Clean squid and cut into rings. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic and onions. Add squid and cook quickly. Add bay leaves. Simmer briefly to avoid tough squid.

Ingredient: Kangkong, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, tomatoes
Instructions: Clean kangkong and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, tomatoes. Add kangkong and stir-fry. Add soy sauce and vinegar. Cook until kangkong is wilted but still crisp.

Ingredient: Eggplant, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, tomatoes
Instructions: Slice eggplant and salt to remove bitterness. Rinse and drain. Sauté garlic, onions, tomatoes. Add eggplant and cook until soft. Add soy sauce and vinegar. Simmer until flavors blend.

Ingredient: String beans, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, pork
Instructions: Cut string beans into pieces. Cut pork into strips. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook. Add string beans, soy sauce, and vinegar. Simmer until beans are tender.

Ingredient: Okra, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, tomatoes
Instructions: Slice okra into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, tomatoes. Add okra and cook until tender. Add soy sauce and vinegar. Simmer until flavors are well combined.

Ingredient: Bitter melon, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, pork
Instructions: Slice bitter melon and salt to remove bitterness. Rinse and drain. Cut pork into strips. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook. Add bitter melon, soy sauce, and vinegar.

Ingredient: Mushrooms, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, oyster sauce
Instructions: Slice mushrooms. Sauté garlic and onions. Add mushrooms and cook until soft. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and oyster sauce. Simmer until mushrooms absorb flavors.

Ingredient: Chicken liver, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, bay leaves
Instructions: Clean chicken liver and cut into pieces. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic and onions. Add liver and cook quickly. Add bay leaves. Simmer briefly.

Ingredient: Pork belly, miso paste, onions, garlic, eggplant, okra
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add hard vegetables first, then soft ones. Add miso paste and mix well. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Fish, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, eggplant, okra
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add vegetables and simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork, shrimp paste, squash, eggplant, okra, string beans
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Season with shrimp paste. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Chicken, ginger, onions, garlic, green papaya, chili leaves
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add water and bring to boil. Add green papaya and chili leaves. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Instructions: Clean fish and cut into steaks. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add water and green papaya. Add malunggay leaves last. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork, ginger, onions, garlic, green papaya, chili leaves
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add pork and cook until browned. Add water and bring to boil. Add green papaya and chili leaves. Simmer until pork is tender.

Ingredient: Chicken, lemongrass, ginger, onions, garlic, green papaya
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add water and lemongrass. Add green papaya. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Fish, lemongrass, ginger, onions, garlic, upo, malunggay
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into steaks. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add fish and lightly fry. Add water and lemongrass. Add upo and malunggay. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork ribs, corn, cabbage, potatoes, onions, peppercorns
Instructions: Cut pork ribs into pieces. Boil pork with onions and peppercorns until tender. Add corn and potatoes. Add cabbage last and cook until soft. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Beef, corn, cabbage, potatoes, onions, peppercorns, fish sauce
Instructions: Cut beef into pieces. Boil beef with onions and peppercorns until tender. Add corn and potatoes. Add cabbage last. Season with fish sauce and salt.

Ingredient: Chicken, corn, cabbage, potatoes, onions, ginger, fish sauce
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Boil chicken with onions and ginger until tender. Add corn and potatoes. Add cabbage last and cook until soft. Season with fish sauce.

Ingredient: Pork belly, tamarind, kangkong, radish, string beans, tomatoes
Instructions: Cut pork belly into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add pork and simmer until tender. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last.

Ingredient: Fish head, tamarind, kangkong, radish, eggplant, tomatoes
Instructions: Clean fish head. Boil water with tamarind. Add fish head and simmer. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last. Season with salt.

Instructions: Cut spare ribs into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add ribs and simmer until tender. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last.

Ingredient: Chicken, tamarind, kangkong, radish, string beans, tomatoes
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add chicken and simmer until tender. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last.

Instructions: Cut salmon belly into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add salmon and cook until flaky. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables in order of cooking time. Add kangkong last.

Instructions: Soak mung beans overnight. Boil until soft. Sauté garlic, onions, pork. Add cooked mung beans and coconut milk. Add shrimp and squash. Simmer until flavors blend.

Instructions: Soak mung beans overnight. Boil until soft. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add cooked mung beans and squash. Add malunggay last.

Instructions: Soak mung beans overnight. Boil until soft. Sauté garlic, onions, pork. Add cooked mung beans and squash. Add sliced ampalaya. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Instructions: Soak mung beans overnight. Boil until soft. Sauté garlic and onions. Add dried fish and fry. Add cooked mung beans and squash. Add malunggay leaves last.

Instructions: Soak mung beans overnight. Boil until soft. Sauté garlic, onions, pork. Add cooked mung beans and squash. Add shrimp and kangkong. Season with bagoong.

Instructions: Clean fish and boil until tender. Remove fish and set aside. Add rice to fish broth and cook until porridge consistency. Add ginger, onions, garlic. Return fish to pot.

Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces and boil until tender. Remove chicken and set aside. Add rice to chicken broth and cook until porridge consistency. Add ginger, onions, garlic. Return chicken.

Instructions: Cut pork into pieces and boil until tender. Remove pork and set aside. Add rice to pork broth and cook until porridge consistency. Add ginger, onions, garlic. Return pork.

Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Marinate in soy sauce. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add sugar and bay leaves. Simmer until pork is tender and sauce is thick.

Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Marinate in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add banana and pineapple. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic, onions, ginger. Add pork and cook until browned. Add tausi and soy sauce. Simmer until pork is tender and sauce is thick.

Instructions: Clean fish and cut into steaks. Boil water with tamarind. Add fish and cook until almost done. Add tomatoes, onions, garlic. Add vegetables and miso paste. Add kangkong last.

Instructions: Cut pork ribs into pieces. Boil water with tamarind. Add pork and simmer until tender. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables and miso paste. Add kangkong last.

Instructions: Clean shrimp. Boil water with tamarind. Add tomatoes and onions. Add vegetables and miso paste. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add kangkong last.

Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Add potatoes and carrots. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Add potatoes and string beans. Simmer until pork is tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, curry powder, eggplant, okra, onions
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Add eggplant and okra. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Vegetables, coconut milk, curry powder, tofu, onions, garlic
Instructions: Cut vegetables into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add hard vegetables first. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Add tofu and soft vegetables. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Beef, coconut milk, curry powder, potatoes, carrots, onions
Instructions: Cut beef into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add beef and cook until browned. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Add potatoes and carrots. Simmer until beef is tender.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, banana heart, chili peppers, onions
Name of the recipe: Ginataang Puso ng Saging na Maanghang
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and banana heart. Add chili peppers. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, green beans, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and green beans. Add chili peppers. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork, coconut milk, squash, chili peppers, shrimp paste, onions
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and squash. Add chili peppers and shrimp paste. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Chicken, coconut milk, kangkong, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and chili peppers. Add kangkong last. Simmer until chicken is tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, eggplant, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and eggplant. Add chili peppers. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork belly, coconut milk, bitter melon, chili peppers, onions
Instructions: Cut pork belly into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and bitter melon. Add chili peppers. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Shrimp, coconut milk, okra, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Clean shrimp. Sauté garlic and onions. Add coconut milk and okra. Add chili peppers. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Simmer until okra is tender.

Ingredient: Fish, coconut milk, labong, chili peppers, onions, garlic
Instructions: Clean fish and cut into pieces. Sauté garlic and onions. Add fish and lightly fry. Add coconut milk and labong. Add chili peppers. Simmer until fish is cooked.

Ingredient: Pork, coconut milk, upo, chili peppers, malunggay, onions
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and upo. Add chili peppers and malunggay. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Crabs, coconut milk, ginger, onions, garlic, chili peppers
Instructions: Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger. Add crabs and cook until they change color. Pour in coconut milk and chili peppers. Simmer until the crabs are cooked through and the sauce has thickened. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Bullet tuna, coconut milk, ginger, garlic, onions, vinegar, chili peppers
Instructions: Sauté ginger, garlic, and onions. Arrange fish in a pot. Pour in coconut milk, vinegar, and chili peppers. Simmer gently until the fish is cooked and the sauce is thick. Do not stir while simmering to prevent the fish from breaking apart.

Ingredient: Mung beans, coconut milk, pork, shrimp, malunggay leaves, onions, garlic, ginger
Instructions: Boil mung beans until soft. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger. Add pork and cook until browned. Add the boiled mung beans, shrimp, and coconut milk. Simmer until the sauce thickens. Stir in malunggay leaves and cook until wilted. Season with salt or fish sauce.

Ingredient: Stingray, coconut milk, ginger, onions, garlic, chili peppers, vinegar
Instructions: Clean stingray and cut into pieces. Sauté ginger, onions, and garlic. Place stingray in the pot and add coconut milk, vinegar, and chili peppers. Simmer until the stingray is tender and the sauce is rich and thick.

Ingredient: Unripe jackfruit, coconut milk, pork or shrimp, chili peppers, onions, garlic, ginger, shrimp paste
Instructions: Boil unripe jackfruit until tender. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger. Add pork or shrimp and cook. Add the boiled jackfruit, coconut milk, shrimp paste, and chili peppers. Simmer until the sauce is thick.

Ingredient: Pork, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, salt
Instructions: Cut pork into cubes. Combine with vinegar, crushed garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, and salt. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer until the pork is tender and the sauce reduces.

Ingredient: Peanuts, garlic, salt, peppercorns, cooking oil
Instructions: Heat oil and fry whole garlic cloves until golden brown and crispy. Add peanuts and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until crunchy. Season with salt and peppercorns.

Ingredient: Chicken or pork, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, pineapple chunks, pineapple juice
Instructions: Marinate chicken/pork in soy sauce and vinegar. Sauté garlic, add the meat, and brown. Add the marinate, bay leaves, peppercorns, pineapple juice, and pineapple chunks. Simmer until the meat is tender.

Ingredient: Kangkong (water spinach), tofu, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, onions, brown sugar
Instructions: Fry tofu until golden. Sauté garlic and onions. Add kangkong and stir-fry. Pour in soy sauce and vinegar. Add a pinch of sugar. Add the fried tofu and mix gently. Cook until the kangkong is just wilted.

Ingredient: Beef cubes, tamarind, tomatoes, onions, radish, kangkong, string beans
Instructions: Boil beef until tender. Add tamarind, tomatoes, and onions. Simmer until the flavors meld. Add the hard vegetables first, followed by the softer ones. Add kangkong last. Season with salt or fish sauce.

Ingredient: Roasted pig (lechon) pieces, tamarind, tomatoes, onions, kangkong, radish
Instructions: Boil water with tamarind. Add tomatoes, onions, and lechon pieces. Simmer briefly. Add vegetables in order of cooking time, with kangkong added last. Season to taste.

Ingredient: Catfish, tamarind, tomatoes, onions, ginger, mustard greens, chili peppers
Instructions: Clean catfish and cut into pieces. Boil water with tamarind, tomatoes, onions, and ginger. Add catfish and simmer until cooked. Add mustard greens and chili peppers. Season with salt.

Ingredient: Beef shank, tomato sauce, cabbage, potatoes, carrots, saba banana, chickpeas
Instructions: Boil beef shank until tender. Sauté onions and garlic. Add beef, tomato sauce, and broth from the boiled beef. Add potatoes, carrots, saba banana, and chickpeas. Simmer until all vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Grilled pig face, pig brain or mayonnaise, vinegar, red onions, chili peppers, calamansi juice
Instructions: Grill or broil pig face until crispy. Chop into small pieces. Mix with boiled pig brain (or mayonnaise), vinegar, red onions, chili peppers, and calamansi juice. Season with salt and pepper.

Ingredient: Pork mask, pig ears, onions, calamansi juice, chili peppers, soy sauce
Instructions: Boil pork mask and ears until tender. Grill or broil until crispy. Chop into fine pieces. Sauté onions and chili peppers. Add the chopped pork and cook until sizzling. Season with calamansi juice, soy sauce, and pepper. Serve on a sizzling plate.

Ingredient: Pig lungs and heart, carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic, vinegar, tomato sauce, chili
Instructions: Boil pig lungs and heart until tender. Chop into small pieces. Sauté garlic, onions, and chili. Add the chopped innards and cook. Add vinegar and tomato sauce. Add potatoes and carrots and simmer until tender.

Ingredient: Pork loin, liver, carrots, potatoes, bell peppers, green peas, vinegar, soy sauce, bay leaf
Instructions: Cut pork and liver into strips. Sauté garlic and onions. Add pork and cook until browned. Add liver, carrots, potatoes, and bell peppers. Pour in vinegar and soy sauce. Add bay leaf and simmer until the meat and vegetables are tender.

Ingredient: Goat or beef innards, ginger, garlic, onions, chili, bile, tamarind
Instructions: Clean innards thoroughly. Boil with ginger, garlic, and onions until tender. Add tamarind and chili. Season with bile for a bitter taste, if desired. Serve hot.

Ingredient: Okra, eggplant, squash, string beans, bitter melon, bagoong (shrimp paste), crispy pork belly (lechon kawali)
Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add water and bagoong. Add hard vegetables (squash) first, then soft vegetables (okra, eggplant, bitter melon, string beans). Simmer until tender. Top with crispy lechon kawali before serving.

Ingredient: Rice noodles, chicken, pork, shrimp, cabbage, carrots, soy sauce, calamansi
Instructions: Soak rice noodles until soft. Sauté garlic, onions, chicken, pork, and shrimp. Add vegetables and stir-fry. Pour in soy sauce and broth. Add the noodles and mix until cooked. Serve with calamansi.

Ingredient: Ground pork, carrots, cabbage, onions, garlic, soy sauce, lumpia wrappers
Instructions: Mix ground pork with shredded carrots, cabbage, minced onions, and garlic. Season with soy sauce. Wrap the mixture in lumpia wrappers. Fry until golden brown and crispy.
